title: Who am I?
paragraph1: My name is Giovana, I'm pursuing a degree in <1>Systems Analysis and Development</1> and I'm passionate about turning ideas into functional interfaces.
paragraph2: I build projects using <1>Typescript, React, TailwindCSS and Next.js.</1> Also enjoy exploring the backend, where I use technologies like <2>Node.js, Express and PostgreSQL.</2>
paragraph3: I'm currently looking for my first opportunity in the tech field, as a <1>Junior Developer / Intern / Trainee.</1>
